summary: This document discusses the tensions between the Government of Vietnam and the U.S. Government over operations in South Vietnam in mid-April 1963. Diem and Nhu were concerned over "infringements" of Vietnamese sovereignty, particularly by the U.S. Special Forces. Diem plans to confront Ambassador Nolting and USMACV Chief General Harkins with evidence and demand a reduction in the number of U.S. personnel in South Vietnam.
title: Central Intelligence Agency Information Report
recipient: STATE/INR DIA ARMY/ACSI NAVY AIR STATE/DIR JCS SECDEF NSA NIC
